title: Grand Canyon National Park: Planning Documents
body: Fire Management Planning Documents       Grand Canyon National Park Fire Management Plan, Approved March 28, 2012, 7.6mb, PDF file To view the planning document list for the Fire Management Plan visit http://parkplanning.nps.gov/documentsList.cfm?parkID=65&projectID=10959  Â    NPS Planning, Environment and Public Comment (PEPC) The PEPC site is a clearing house of NPS planning documents. Here you can explore and comment on proposed NPS activities.
